title: Ghostbusters, Volume 7: Happy Horror Days!
description: A busy season of holidays has the team needing a rest. It all starts on Devil's Night with a ghost called Stingy Jack, continues on Day of the Dead with the return of Melanie Ortiz to NYC, a trip to Rhinebeck, NY for a celebration held in honor of Sinterklass, and a visit from the Bogeyman on New Years Day.Collects issues 9-12.
author: Erik Burnham
